name: com.neureality.lz
description:
Easy LSL and ZMQ broadcasting in Unity, made for Neureality!

Manual Dependencies -- Add these packages via their URL, just like this one:
	https://github.com/labstreaminglayer/LSL4Unity.git

samples.description: A simple example of how to use LSL in Unity.
A simple example of how to use ZMQ in Unity.
